definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: Ex 22:1 thief—[[גַּנׇּב]] Ex 22:1 + 12 t.; [[גַּנׇּבִים]] Is 1:23 + 3 t.—thief that breaks in Ex 22:1, Ex 22:6, Ex 22:7 (JE); by window Joe 2:9 (in simile); thief as one who steals Is 1:23, Ps 50:18, Pr 6:30, Pr 29:24, Je 2:26, Je 48:27, Ho 7:1 (‖[[גְּדוּד]]) Zec 5:4; coming by night Je 49:9 cf. Job 24:14 (in simile), Ob:Ob 5 (‖[[שׁוֹדֲדֵי לַיְלָה]]); Job 30:5; stealer of men (slave-dealer) De 24:7.
